CustomField.description: Changes Colour letter into the name
CustomField.formula: Case( Colour_Code__c, "A", "Amber", "B", "Flint" , "C" , "Artic Blue", "D", "Colbalt Blue", "E" , "Half Flint", "F", "Autumn Leaf", "K", "Mallaca", "L", "Sea Green", "M", "Eurogreen/Moss", "N", "Black", "O", "Dark Green", "T", "Brown", "V", "Green", " ")
CustomField.label: Colour
